duck: Robert Elegant - Robert Sampson Elegant is a British-American author and journalist born in New York City.
elegance definition: refined grace or dignified propriety.
Elegance is a synonym for beautiful that has come to acquire the additional connotations of unusual effectiveness and simplicity.

wiki.text:
]] .]]

'Elegance' is a synonym for [[beauty|beautiful]] that has come to acquire the
additional connotations of unusual effectiveness and simplicity. It is
frequently used as a standard of tastefulness particularly in the areas of
visual design, decoration, the sciences, and the esthetics of mathematics.
Elegant things exhibit refined and dignified propriety.
wiki.title: elegance
